title: GTPL Hathway Standalone December 2025 Net Sales at Rs 610.03 crore, up 9.69% Y-o-Y
author: Broker Research
content:
Reported Standalone quarterly numbers for GTPL Hathway are:Net Sales at Rs 610.03 crore in December 2025 up 9.69% from Rs. 556.16 crore in December 2024. Quarterly Net Profit at Rs. 0.91 crore in December 2025 down 91.5% from Rs. 10.66 crore in December 2024. EBITDA stands at Rs. 58.71 crore in December 2025 down 10.2% from Rs. 65.38 crore in December 2024. GTPL Hathway EPS has decreased to Rs. 0.08 in December 2025 from Rs. 0.95 in December 2024. GTPL Hathway shares closed at 96.60 on January 09, 2026 (NSE) and has given -15.26% returns over the last 6 months and -21.01% over the last 12 months.
